title: Can Legacy or Championship Skins go on sale?
body:
I really want SSW Talon. So I was wondering can it be on sale but not around worlds?

{{champion:91}}

replies.body: I don't have any information on sales for legacy skins until it actually happens, so I couldn't say for sure.  Bookmark the [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page in case something comes up!  Hopefully, you'll see some cool sales!
